00004 template <class VoxelType> 
00005 void FlatSE::makeBallEuclidian2D(Image <VoxelType> &img, double r)
00006 {
00007         points.clear();
00008         offsets.clear();
00009         
00010         double vx=img.getSpacingX();
00011         double vy=img.getSpacingY();
00012         
00013         int ux=(int)(r/vx);
00014         int uy=(int)(r/vy);
00015         
00016         double rr=r*r;
00017         
00018         for(int x=-ux; x<=ux; x++)
00019                 for(int y=-uy; y<=uy; y++)
00020                         {
00021                                 if(x*x*vx*vx+y*y*vy*vy<= rr)
00022                                         {
00023                                         Point<TCoord>  p;
00024                                         p.x=x;
00025                                         p.y=y;
00026                                         p.z=0;
00027                                         points.push_back(p);
00028                                         }
00029                         }
00030 }

00032 template <class VoxelType> 
00033 void FlatSE::makeBallChessboard2D(Image <VoxelType> &img, double rx, double ry)
00034 {
00035         points.clear();
00036         offsets.clear();
00037         
00038         double vx=img.getVx();
00039         double vy=img.getVy();

00041         int ux=(int)(rx/vx);
00042         int uy=(int)(ry/vy);
00043

00045                 for(int y=-uy; y<=uy; y++)
00046                         {
00047                         Point<TCoord>  p;

00055 template <class VoxelType> 
00056 void FlatSE::makeBallEuclidian3D(Image  <VoxelType> &img, double r)
00057 {
00058         points.clear();
00059         offsets.clear();
00060         
00061         double vx=img.getVx();
00062         double vy=img.getVy();
00063         double vz=img.getVz();
00064         
00065         int ux=(int)(r/vx);
00066         int uy=(int)(r/vy);
00067         int uz=(int)(r/vz);
00068         
00069         int uxux=ux*ux; int uyuy=uy*uy; int uzuz=uz*uz;
00070         double rr=r*r;
00071         
00072         for(int x=-ux; x<=ux; x++)
00073                 for(int y=-uy; y<=uy; y++)
00074                         for(int z=-uz; z<=uz; z++)
00075                                 {
00076                                 if(x*x*uxux+y*y*uyuy+z*z*uzuz<= rr)
00077                                         {
00078                                         Point<TCoord>  p;
00079                                         p.x=x;
00080                                         p.y=y;
00081                                         p.z=z;
00082                                         points.push_back(p);
00083                                         }
00084                         }
00085 }

00088 template <class T>
00089 void FlatSE::makeCircle2D(Image <T> &img, double r, double t)
00090 {
00091         points.clear();
00092         offsets.clear();
00093         
00094         double vx=img.getSpacingX();
00095         double vy=img.getSpacingY();
00096         
00097         int ux=(int)(r/vx);
00098         int uy=(int)(r/vy);
00099         
00100         double rr=r*r;
00101         double rrtt=(r+t)*(r+t);
00102         
00103         for(int x=-ux; x<=ux; x++)
00104                 for(int y=-uy; y<=uy; y++)
00105                         if(x*x*vx*vx+y*y*vy*vy<= rrtt && x*x*vx*vx+y*y*vy*vy>=rr)
00106                                 {
00107                                 Point<TCoord>  p;
00108                                 p.x=x;
00109                                 p.y=y;
00110                                 p.z=0;
00111                                 points.push_back(p);
00112                                 }
00113 }

00118 
00119 inline FlatSE::FlatSE(const Image <unsigned char> &im)
00120 {
00121         int dx=im.getSizeX();
00122         int dy=im.getSizeY();
00123         int dz=im.getSizeZ();
00124         
00125         int oImx=dx/2;
00126         int oImy=dy/2;
00127         int oImz=dz/2;
00128         
00129         for(int z=0; z<dz; z++)
00130                 for(int y=0; y<dy; y++)
00131                         for(int x=0; x<dx; x++)
00132                                 {
00133                                 if(im(x,y,z)>0)
00134                                         {
00135                                         Point<TCoord>  p(x-oImx, y-oImy, z-oImz);
00136                                         addPoint (p);
00137                                         }
00138                                 }
00139 }

00141 inline FlatSE &FlatSE::operator=(const FlatSE &src)
00142 {
00143         if(this != &src)
00144                 {
00145                 this->points=src.points;
00146                 this->offsets=src.offsets;
00147                 }
00148         return *this;
00149 }

00152 inline int FlatSE::getNbPoints() const
00153 {
00154         return points.size();
00155 }
00156 
00157 inline void FlatSE::setContext(const TSize *imSize)
00158 {
00159         offsets.clear();
00160         offsets.reserve(points.size());
00161         
00162         std::vector<Point<TCoord> >::iterator it;
00163         std::vector<Point<TCoord> >::iterator end=points.end();
00164         for(it=points.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00165         {
00166                 int offset = it->x + (it->y)*imSize[0] + (it->z)*imSize[0]*imSize[1];
00167                 offsets.push_back(offset);
00168         }
00169 }

00172 // -------
00173 
00174 inline TCoord* FlatSE::getNegativeOffsets()
00175 {
00176         TCoord *offs = new TCoord [3];
00177         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) offs[i] = 0;
00178         for (int i = 0; i < getNbPoints(); i++)
00179         {
00180                 Point<TCoord>  c = getPoint(i);
00181                 offs[0] = std::max(offs[0],-(c.x));
00182                 offs[1] = std::max(offs[1],-(c.y));
00183                 offs[2] = std::max(offs[2],-(c.z));
00184         }
00185         
00186         return offs;
00187 }
00188 
00189 // ---
00190 
00191 inline TCoord* FlatSE::getPositiveOffsets()
00192 {
00193         TCoord *offs = new TCoord[3];
00194         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) offs[i] = 0;
00195         for (unsigned int iN = 0; iN < points.size(); iN++)
00196         {
00197                 Point<TCoord>  c = points[iN];
00198                 offs[0] = std::max(offs[0],(c.x));
00199                 offs[1] = std::max(offs[1],(c.y));
00200                 offs[2] = std::max(offs[2],(c.z));
00201         }
00202         return offs;
00203 }
00204 
00208  inline Image<U8> FlatSE::toImage()
00209  {
00210         TSize imageSize[3];
00211         
00212         TCoord *pOffsets=getPositiveOffsets();
00213         TCoord *nOffsets=getNegativeOffsets();
00214         
00215         
00216         imageSize[0]=1+2*std::max(pOffsets[0],nOffsets[0]);
00217         imageSize[1]=1+2*std::max(pOffsets[1],nOffsets[1]);
00218         imageSize[2]=1+2*std::max(pOffsets[2],nOffsets[2]);
00219         
00220         Image<U8> result(imageSize);
00221         result.fill(0);
00222         
00223         //cout << imageSize[0] << " " << imageSize[1] << " " << imageSize[2] << "\n";
00224         
00225         //Coordinates of the origin in image
00226         Point<TCoord>  oImage(imageSize[0]/2,imageSize[1]/2,imageSize[2]/2);
00227         
00228         for (int i = 0; i < getNbPoints(); i++)
00229         {
00230                 Point<TCoord>  c = getPoint(i)+oImage;
00231                 //c.print();
00232                 result(c)=255;
00233         }
00234         return result;
00235  }

00238 inline void FlatSE::makeSymmetric()
00239 {
00240         FlatSE result;
00241         
00242         for(std::vector<Point<TCoord> >::iterator it=this->points.begin(); it!=this->points.end(); ++it)
00243                 {
00244                 Point<TCoord>  p=*it;
00245                 p.x=-p.x;
00246                 p.y=-p.y;
00247                 p.z=-p.z;
00248                 result.points.push_back(p);
00249                 }
00250         
00251         
00252         *this=result;   
00253 }

00257 inline void FlatSE::make2DN4()
00258 {
00259         points.clear();
00260         offsets.clear();
00261         
00262         Point<TCoord>  N(0,-1);
00263         Point<TCoord>  S(0,1);
00264         Point<TCoord>  W(-1,0);
00265         Point<TCoord>  E(1,0);
00266         
00267         points.push_back(N);
00268         points.push_back(S);
00269         points.push_back(W);
00270         points.push_back(E);
00271         
00272         
00273 }
